msContents.summary: Receipt given by Andrea Goussen, acting on behalf of Simon Clabant, a sergeant in Petit-Bois of Pacy, to Reignier le Coustelier, the viscount of Evreux. The receipt is for the sum of 115 sous and 4 derniers, payed for the service of 123 days, at the rate of 8 derniers per day. The transaction took place in the presence of Pierre Becherel, a lieutenant in Pacy. The receipt is dated 1385 Nov. 11. The text is 8 lines long and is written in a secretary script; this receipt is removed from a larger sheet of parchment. A modern transcription of the text is filed with the receipt.

msItem.title: Miscellaneous manuscripts

Evreux, Reignier le Coustelier, vicomte d'
